channel.title: Renaming Items
channel.description:
I need some help renating items on my server. First off, do I need to edit this in the client, or server?
So far, I have edited ITEMS.xml on mopar, I have edited items.cfg on my server, itemlist.cfg on server, and itemlist.java. The new information only shows up during the 2nd trade screen. Why is this? Thank you.

item.title: Renaming Items
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Yes, that’s probably what I was thinking of. Thank you J.

Read full topic

item.title: Renaming Items
item.dc:creator: @J112 J
item.description:
@J112 wrote:

You actually can edit a item name if you mean when it’s like if you mean like this:

Wield CRAPITEM LOL / 3 more options

Then yes, it is pozzible. You need your own client which you can edit and ecteria I believe though.

Read full topic

item.title: Renaming Items
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Wow, ok. I saw on ALIENSCAPE or someone like that, he had an item named something else. Thank you though.

Read full topic

item.title: Renaming Items
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

You cannot change the name of the item you get which you click on it, it’s not possible atm, it might be in the future though, you never know.

Read full topic
